website_summaries.verdict: Premium adult washcloths that feature aloe vera, vitamin E, and lanolin to help cleanse and protect the skin.
pros: Cleansing wipes are ultra-thick and incredibly soft
Can be used to pick up hair without any friction
Easy to carry on the go
cons: Moisture level leaves much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a burning sensation
customer_reviews.text: I really did not like them. They gave me a burning sensation in sensitive areas. They are big, much bigger and a lot cheaper than a brand I did like, and am using. This is not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Ilana Braun

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin cleaning
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great, the wipe is quite large, so fold in half an its better. These wipes or wash clothes as CNA's call them are fantastic especially if your child or family member is incontinent. Easy Gentile on the skin great for those sensitive area's. Another great use is to quick wash your neck after shaving, picks up the hairs easily without any friction. I would buy & suggest this to everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: NetWorkPro

customer_reviews.title: OK, but.....
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice size and good quality cloths. They do not pop up which makes getting them out of the small hole a bit annoying. They are pictured with a flip top lid, but mine came with a piece of sticky plastic that was not easy to open and close. I will not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Prima Wipes Review
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these post surgery. They are refreshing, clean well and quite large They are perfect for what I need. I've had wipes from Walmart and other places I will only buy these now. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pukeko

customer_reviews.title: These are great “adult towels”
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have very sensitive skin and nose for fragrance... I wash with hypoallergenic EVERYTHING sadly. These are great very low smell and stay moist. They are big size and I even set to aside and use them again in a process. I am very confused with other reviews and must have a different batch? These will save me during a power outage as a bath replacement way better than wipes I used in past. I use then for body surface cleaning and they are refreshing and quick to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I was very glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the comments from others while wondering which wipes to purchase for my husband who is suffering from cancer, I was very glad that I did. These wipes were ample in both size and moisture and did the job far better than I anticipated. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jsdane

customer_reviews.title: Big Messes need big wipes
customer_reviews.text: We are using these wipes in a theater production of Bloody Bloody Andrew Jackson to clean up the performers during the show. If you don't know the show BBAJ, the main leader performers on stage get into a weird blood letting scene right before they start kissing. So the actress who is coming off stage covered in fake stage blood needs to get cleaned up right away, these wipes allow the actress to clean up herself. With the normal wipes we were burning through half a package of baby wipes per show.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: hold your breathe
customer_reviews.text: not a pleasant smell to wipe over your body. Not overpowering but also not refreshing to wipe on your skin
customer_reviews.author: Johnny G

customer_reviews.title: Great moist “bath” towel
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and great for hot summer days when you don’t want to shower several times. The towels are easy on my sensitive skin and the scent is very mild.
customer_reviews.author: laurals

customer_reviews.title: Good to have around the house
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from migraine headaches, these pills do seem to provide some relief from migraines that are NOT debilating. Some migraine sufferers know there are degrees of headaches, kind of if the headache coming will be a longer or not-so-long episode, severity and things like that. This product contains everthing in migraine meds (aspirin, caffeine, etc.), with NO active ingredient. It can help you, it can help me,
customer_reviews.author: CrazyPetLady

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad’s caregivers to use. They loved them and he said they are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Luann S. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: THE CATS MEOW!
customer_reviews.text: Iove these wipes! It takes a lot to please me, but Prima wipes are great! My main and only problem is the price. Being on social security I can't afford these..
customer_reviews.author: V. J. McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These are similar to the cleansing cloths used in hospitals. These are great for a quick clean up or anytime you feel the need to “freshen up” between baths/showers.
customer_reviews.author: Steve  Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: First adult cloth I tried, will try others
customer_reviews.text: Don't come out easily and pull up another cloth each time. They are very large and soft, however. They are perfumed a little, but not over whelmingly so.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Better than the ones I brought back from the hospital
customer_reviews.text: Great size and come out one at a time consistantly
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: They are OKAY.
customer_reviews.text: Did not pull out one at a time. Needed to take out several at a time and return the rest to the package.
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, in the car, the house, the gym,  the bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Versatile wipe. Great in the car, great for quick wipe offs, great in hot weather, and, of course great for those with difficulty bathing or confined to bed. The Prima wipes are sturdy, large and leave the skin fresher and are non-drying. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anne D. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 97 yr old mother. She has problems bathing and these really help.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelyn Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: When I got my wipes, the package was sealed tight, but everytime I pulled one out to use it appeared dry.So I haf to run under a little water for moisture, Don't think I will ever reorfer again,😔
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Cook

customer_reviews.title: Easy For Me To Keep Clean
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I would do without this product. At 93, it is very difficult for me to climb in and out of the bathtub. These cloths are wonderful, and when I'm through using them on every area of my body, I feel and smell squeaky clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camping must have
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping Use them all the time Large wipes and always moist Smell nice too
customer_reviews.author: Colonel Angus

customer_reviews.title: 1000 uses
customer_reviews.text: These are great as a pack along or for at use. The clothes are large enough to bathe an adult w 2-3 cloths. This would be great for child care but too big for just Han cleaning. If Jr had made a mess of hands, face, hair, and upper body, these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Endo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: does the job of keeping me clean all over, without wasting precious water.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Charles b. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down 👎
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. I find they are a little dry compared to other brands. Also the lid does not stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: Big cloth, NO MOISTURE IN CLOTH
customer_reviews.text: Next to worthless. Cant clean with no fluidx in the wipe. Wash your car with em, thatsc all they are good for
customer_reviews.author: KIRBY ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Big Towel no chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Big towel, not very moist so I added some water. It worked ok, I like the size and I seem cleaner than with a baby wet wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Means

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! Large, moist, and thick. Did not dry out easily. Used these after surgery when I couldn't bathe.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Strong and efficient
customer_reviews.text: They're everything I want for the nether regions. Very strong gets the job done like washcloths would I would definitely get these again
customer_reviews.author: Anna Manning

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a time when we were camping without a shower.
customer_reviews.author: ElementaryComputers

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Top came loose however still kept the product dry. Order came fast
customer_reviews.author: Connie B. Dauphinais

customer_reviews.title: dis not like the scent
customer_reviews.text: No difference from any other wipes...dis not like the scent..
customer_reviews.author: jean jean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes! They are a larger size, so they always get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: prima wipes
customer_reviews.text: the caregiver like the size it makes her [his] job easier . and my husband had no more skin problems
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Wipes were large and thick. Very helpful for camping when showers were not available. Not sure why the wipes look green in the picture, they were white.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Homeless!  Due to Ease and convenience
customer_reviews.text: I give these out to a homeless man and he really loves them 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Tormey

customer_reviews.title: These are great for camping
customer_reviews.text: These are great for camping. I also use them on the dog (she’s a big girl) to knock out that dog funk smell when it’s too cold for a bath
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: I have so much trouble with my back that reaching ...
customer_reviews.text: I have so much trouble with my back that reaching behind me is a problem.... with these I feel cleaner quicker.
customer_reviews.author: MBV31

customer_reviews.title: They are good
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 5 but my last container had a defective opening. Could hardly get open. You could see that the opening had been placed incorrectly. They are excellent but someone should check them before sending to make sure opening is placed correctly
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L.

customer_reviews.title: Product could be a little more moist.
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more moist; otherwise it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good, large size
customer_reviews.text: Good, large size that makes a clean up easier. Very useful for a disaster kit or waterless shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for the perfect wipe, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does the job. Nice large size and they hold together like no other wipe I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Edward H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient extra large size period is great for elderly people in between showers or camping.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my husbands a trucker and likes being able to freshen up on the road
customer_reviews.author: butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Great clean feeling.
customer_reviews.text: These worked excellent. When too hurt to bath - these worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: AuntLlama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great, husband wasn't able to shower and I got him these, there wonderful
customer_reviews.author: donna lee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early and in good condition
customer_reviews.text: These are really good wipes to have around when you don't have the luxury of getting in a shower, so when someone is disabled they work out really well between the sponge baths.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Cook-Rude

customer_reviews.title: Personal wipes
customer_reviews.text: Large Wipes, very mild scent, no complaints - however would prefer smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Carol NIchols

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently had to wear a heart monitor for a while and could not bathe. These wipes were a lifesaver to me.
customer_reviews.author: honeysuckle

customer_reviews.title: keep looking
customer_reviews.text: these aren't meant for bowel movements. look for another wipe that can do it all.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Webb

customer_reviews.title: good but not that good
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product, however when I attempted to re-order I find the price has doubled. Sorry, no sale.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Seidl

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy sponge baths
customer_reviews.text: These are great for sponge baths on most of body. They are very smooth and fall short of getting body folds thoroughly. Obese people need something with more wash cloth texture there. I am sensitive to many"bath"products but these don't cause any problems. Well pleased with them for clean up between baths. Size great for large areas.
customer_reviews.author: margaret l

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I only wish these were flushable, otherwise, these are awesome. They are a staple in my gym bag and I love how big they are, so I only need to use 1 or 2 per use.
customer_reviews.author: Kleine

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Like the nice large size. I am a caregiver for my wife and use them several times daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Arend

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful but after using 3 to wash my entire body I really felt clean.
customer_reviews.author: grandma emily

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisifed
customer_reviews.text: convenient, large wipes that serve their purpose when one cannot take a shower
customer_reviews.author: Albert D.

customer_reviews.title: Good to Go!
customer_reviews.text: OTR trucker -- needed something bigger than baby wipes to handle hygenic needs in-between showers. This product is the ticket! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Macmoran

customer_reviews.title: Prima Wipes Adult washcloths are just what I need for cleaning my husband's personal areas.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very good size. It is large enough to handle easily and move around the area to be cleaned without my loosing mygrip on it. I tried another washcloth that was twice the thickness, but I did not need that so it wasn't as economical. This washcloth does the job, and I like that the package has 64 wipes and has an extra flap covering the opening to the package to keep the wipes from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Olson

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST. They are large and moist. The packaging is excellent as there is a tab to close to keep them moist. My husband loves them as they don't leave a residual smell.
customer_reviews.author: Treeland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very good and work well with elderly care.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These wipes were the perfect solution when I was injured and unable to shower.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A little too expensive for such amount of washcloths. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Maggu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally washcloths that are big enough for a grown man.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne cribbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we use these by the case very good quality and plenty big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Too dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a camping trip. Too dry for me.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Totally disgusting.
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this item, I had written to you stating that the cloths had black spots on them. Today I was down to a few left and this picture shows it was mold on all of them. Totally disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Thornton

customer_reviews.title: 2nd favorite of the 3 I tried
customer_reviews.text: I had spinal fusion surgery in early November and wasn't allowed to shower without wearing a cumbersome brace that took over 3 hours to dry. Needless to say, showering was an ordeal. But since I am accustomed to showering every day, I needed a way to be "clean" without having to fight the battle of the brace. These adult washcloths solved the problem. They do an amazingly thorough job of cleaning, leaving you feeling refreshed without any lingering fragrance or residue. I was thrilled to be able to go back to showering regularly after about 6 weeks, but in the meantime, these cloths really saved the day.
customer_reviews.author: Morgana Raven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: After my husband had a stroke and was cleared to come home, there were things I needed to purchase. These were one of them. I wasn't sure where to start, so I went to my tried and trusted Amazon and started researching. Thank goodness people leave reviews! After research, I ordered these. I actually now have them on an automatic recorder each month. It is great!!! These wipes are just what I wanted. They are well made, the scent is subtle, the size is perfect, and they clean well, while being gentle on the skin. That is very important. My husband has sensitive skin. Excellent quality, price, and service. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Wipes To Use If Can't Shower Due To Illness
customer_reviews.text: Got these wipes for my mom while receiving Chemo treatments. She used them if she felt too weak to take a shower. She was very grateful for these wipes because they were easy to use and made her feel fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: WinnyHoney

customer_reviews.title: Disposable Bathing Cloth
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, a disposable wash cloth for showering. Very light amount of soap on it, which I wanted because I rinse it and apply my own shower soap. I'm very picky and the scent is light, but the cloth is strong. Once done just toss in trash and you're done. Unlike cloth wash cloths that may not wash all the cooties out in washer, this is more sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Saywhat4you

customer_reviews.title: Quick Refreshful Wash.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a quick wash. With the heat, by the end of the day, u feel like you need refreshing. They are handy to have around and very quickly u feel refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucreatia

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! A truly UNSCENTED whipe!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like these- very hard to find large UNSCENTED WHIPES. THESE FIT THE BILL. I use to freshen up during the day w a cleansing foam. I suffer from IBS- and these work well for cleaning up after accidents. I find they are wet enough. I've tried wipes that are barely nothing more than toliet paper in a container.
customer_reviews.author: Bright spot

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: If you like wipes that don't have a scent and not very moist then you'll love these. I was hoping for something with more moisture in them & a fresh scent. Also when I'm rubbing the wipe on my body it tends to bunch up on me. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Waidler

customer_reviews.title: Beware of packages that arrived with the sheets turning dry!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these body-wipes before, and they work fine: good alternative to a shower if you're in a hurry. The latest shipment, however, arrived with the cloths beginning to dry out--and I can't return the package. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Underhilll

customer_reviews.title: Great for after surgery, large and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use after major surgery. After I went home, I used them between EOD showers, and they were great. I'm a fairly small person, and I rarely sweat, so I used two to clean up, but one would've been sufficient. They are very large and sturdy, with a mild neutral scent, so I was very pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: dobies'mom

customer_reviews.title: BUILT FOR CAREFUL USE
customer_reviews.text: it does work surprisely well considering that the closure slid off on the second day leaving the wipes open to the air, NO GLUE or whatever was suposed to hold it on, the wipes are OK, not good -- that they lasted any time at all is amazing
customer_reviews.author: zapp22

customer_reviews.title: They burn my skin.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like these wipes at all. It's really hard to only remove 1. I'm waisting more than half of them. Whatever they add to them that is supposed to be soothing is far from it. It burns the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wipe for patient care.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are perfect. They are soft and just wet enough to do their job. They do not have a chemical smell or really a smell of any type. Have been using for over a year now. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beaucork

customer_reviews.title: Adult feminine wash cloths
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many baby wipes but they are always too small to do a good job especially on an adult. These are large and the way they are packaged they do not dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Suellen Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Adult washcloths
customer_reviews.text: Wife used. Said they were OK but didn't ask me to reorder either. Using Cottonelle and Aloe Vesta cleaning foam by ConvaTec.
customer_reviews.author: Walter S.

customer_reviews.title: First thing I noticed with these are the larger size ...
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed with these are the larger size, in fact, larger then any other I tried, however, they are not very moist at all. I will not be ordering these again unless they make changes to them.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: Large effective cleaning pad, easy disposal
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery and while recovering some incontinence. These are easy to carry in a backpack along with adult pads. Do a great job of cleanup with easy disposal so I was clean and more importantly odor free at work. Best part was when I didn't need them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Armendariz

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a thicker cloth, similar to ones I'd used after two surgeries. Unfortunately that product has been discontinued by another company. These are just large baby wipes. I'm done with them and won't reorder. .I'll continue to look for a more satisfactory bathing cloth to use after my next illness or surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cahall

customer_reviews.title: Very unpleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: This work ok, but they have such an unpleasant chemical odor that I don't like using them. Will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Eva McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: These wipes play an extremely important role in my hurricane preparedness. In the event of water loss, I can at least bring some cleanliness to my family.
customer_reviews.author: bmc

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found these sooner
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my Mom after she was discharged from the Hospital. She was Bed Bound for several weeks. These Washcloths are very large. I was very happy about that. They works great on sensitive areas and all over.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Clasp is simple. But broken.
customer_reviews.text: The clasp is broken. So will not shut...I can't return because I need them. Have ordered in the past. No problem? ?? Quality control before shipping would be nice...disappointed. oh just found out, item is not returnable anyway. ..
customer_reviews.author: shari j

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used on incontinence patient. Plenty big for larger patient holding together perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Methylchloroisothiazolinone
customer_reviews.text: Two of the ingredients are methylchloroisothiazolinone and methylisothiazolinone. You might Google these and read about them. Judge for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Day

customer_reviews.title: These are huge!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wipes! Huge, moist enough -- not dripping, no objectionable odor, and soft. I'll buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Good size really no smell but do not have a lot of moisture. Almost dry by time you finish. Still work good.
customer_reviews.author: C-HAWK

customer_reviews.title: Stinky.
customer_reviews.text: Work great, great size for cleaning up but the smell is nasty. Doesn't smell fresh, just kind of medicinal.
customer_reviews.author: CFerguson

customer_reviews.title: These are great after a day of Geocaching
customer_reviews.text: These are great after a day of Geocaching. Clean up the grass stains and grime from GRCs. I have also found they work well to get unexpected dirt off your clothes without leaving stains.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Large diaper wipes, no soothing ointment for diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: These work okay for wiping after a bowel movement, but I miss the soothing ointment that prevents diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L Coleman

customer_reviews.title: ... more or less an invalid and these are so nice for him
customer_reviews.text: My husband is more or less an invalid and these are so nice for him. He can clean himself with my help. He cannot shower anymore so these are a blessing to have to help keep him clean.
customer_reviews.author: G-ma

customer_reviews.title: A good size.
customer_reviews.text: We like these adult washcloths but wish they were a bit damper. The ones on top aren't nearly as wet as those at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: S3 Stitches

customer_reviews.title: Large and Strong
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous review. I am now back ordering again for the 5th time. Buy, you won't regret. I just received this product. Yes they are as big as a washcloth if not a big bigger. I was pleased when I realized how strong they were. I will never buy anything else, a must have staple for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing in Midwest

customer_reviews.title: One of the few 12" washcloths out there- although a ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the few 12" washcloths out there- although a bit overpriced. There are less expensive items if the size is not so much a factor. And sometimes its hard to get out just 1
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This brand is the extra-long length — perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased these for years for washing up when pain limits ability to fully bathe or shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: Did not like these wipes as they were not wet enough to be effective even when the package had just been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: *** I've bought these wipes 4 times over the last 6 months. They are the best! Do not hesitate! BUY!!!! Very nice size and quality. Not too much scent but is still fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Just Trying to Shop

product_meta.title: Prima Wipes Adult Washcloths, 48 Extra-large Wipes Per Pack by Life Guard
product_meta.description: The largest, thickest wipes on the market. Prima Wipes premoistened adult washcloths offer unmatched perineal cleansing. An ultra-thick and incredibly soft cleansing wipe that is fragrance-free, hypoallergenic and enriched with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Lanolin that helps to gently cleanse and protect skin surrounding the sensitive perineal area. Extra-large 9"x13" wipe helps to ensure optimum cleansing and minimizes waste while protecting the caregiver. First Aid Global Wholesale has exclusive container accessibility so we are the ONLY supplier with the freshest Prima Wipes.
feature_bullets: Enriched with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Lanolin for gentle cleansing around sensitive areas.
Hypoallergenic, alcohol free, incredibly thick, ultra soft & strong
Fragrance free formula. Wipe desired area thoroughly with washcloth.
Repeat if necessary. Pat area dry after use if necessary. Buy from FirstAidGlobal for the freshest wipes.
